alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 1:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bladen and northeastern Robeson Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Duart, or 14 miles northeast of Lumberton, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tobermory, Smiths, Tolarsville, Duart, White Oak, Jerome, Dublin, and Tar Heel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
